#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i,t,n,j,ans;
    char s[10001];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>s;
        n=strlen(s);
        ans=0;
        for(i=0,j=n-1;i<j;i++,j--)
        {
            if(s[i]!=s[j])
            {
                ans++;
                if(ans>1)
                    break;
            }
        }
        if(ans<2)
        {
            printf("yes\n");
        }
        else
            printf("no\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
